revised_title: Anatomical and Morphological Study of the Human Lachrymal Bone and its Accessory Ossicles
tldr: The author examines 1000 lachrymal bones and over 300 orbits, studying the varieties and morphology of the human lachrymal bone and its accessory ossicles. The research covers aspects such as absence of the lachrymal bone, rudimentary conditions, varieties in outline and suturation, ankylosis, crista forms, measurements, vascular relations, periosteum and soft parts relations, and developmental history.
